name: Camenisch et al., Appellants, v. Allen et al.

judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.
parties: Camenisch et al., Appellants, v. Allen et al.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed at Appellant’s cost, on the opinion of Judge Brown.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

casebody.head_matter:
Camenisch et al., Appellants, v. Allen et al.
Argued Dec. 7, 1944.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Hughes, JJ.
Abraham Wermck, for appellants.
Lewis R. Linet, for appellees.
January 2, 1945:
